svg.text: Three Types of Power in AC Circuits
• Vector sum of P and Q
Power Factor = cos φ = Real Power / Apparent Power = P / S

g.text: • Higher line currents and I²R losses
• QC = QL to achieve unity PF

svg.text: P = VI cos φ (W), Q = VI sin φ (VAR), S = VI (VA)
PF = cos φ = P/S, tan φ = Q/P, S² = P² + Q²
QC = P(tan φ₁ - tan φ₂), C = QC/(2πfV²)
